sentences.en: Clothes are a fundamental form of self-expression.
sentences.cn: 服饰是一种基本的自我表现形式。

sentences.en: You should encourage your child's attempts at self-expression.
sentences.cn: 对孩子表达自我的尝试，你应当加以鼓励。

sentences.en: The notes and art scribbled on the walls are an experiment in self-expression.
sentences.cn: 在墙上匆匆写下的笔记和美术作品是一个进行自我表达的实验。
